com.chute.sdk.v2.api.asset

Class GCAssets

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chute.sdk.v2.api.asset.GCAssets

  • public class GCAssets
extends Object
    The GCAssets class is a helper class for managing AssetModel. The API enables users and developers to access the following methods: getting, uploading, importing, updating and deleting assets, retrieving asset's exif and geo-location data, getting and updating asset's caption, as well as getting and updating all tags associated within an asset.

      • imports

        public static com.dg.libs.rest.HttpRequest imports(android.content.Context context,
                                   ArrayList<String> urls,
                                   com.dg.libs.rest.callbacks.HttpCallback<ListResponseModel<AssetModel>> callback)
        Imports asset(s) by providing an existing URL targeting the specific media item. Imported assets this way wonâ€™t belong to an album. You can use {@see #GCAlbums.Assets.add(Context, AlbumModel, ArrayList, HttpCallback>) to add assets to one or multiple albums
        Parameters:
        context - - The application context
        album - - Album containing assets for import
        urls - - List of asset URLs to be imported
        callback - - Instance of HttpCallback interface. If successful, the callback returns ResponseModel
        Returns:
        - AssetsImportRequest

      • list

        public static com.dg.libs.rest.HttpRequest list(android.content.Context context,
                                Sort sort,
                                Filter filter,
                                com.dg.libs.rest.callbacks.HttpCallback<ListResponseModel<AssetModel>> callback)
        Pulls a complete list of all assets accessible to the user. The assets can be filtered and ordered base on some parameters.
        Parameters:
        context - - The application context
        sort - - ID: Sorts by asset id, newest comes first - Hearts - Sorts by hearts, the one containing highest number of hearts comes first - Position - Sorts by position - Default sorting: Done by the Album. If manually set by the user assets will be sorted by position, if not, they will be sorted by ID
        filter - - Filter assets by username and service(Chute, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Picasa, Flickr)
        callback - - Instance of HttpCallback interface. If successful, the callback returns ResponseModel
        Returns:
        AssetsListRequest
